txt.en: Defeated creatures hunting the ox-herds of the Uch-lûth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The oxherds of the Uch-lûth were pleased with your efforts upon their behalf.

'You have shown great skill and courage in defending our herds against the wolves and fell creatures which hunt them, but I fear the attacks will not soon stop.\n\n'Will you continue to aid us, Duvodiad? As long as you lend us your aid, we will supply your wandering friends with meat.'

The Uch-lûth's herds graze to the north-east of Uch Cadlus.\n\nDavudh has asked you to continue protecting their herds against the wolves and other fell things which hunt them in return for a continuing supply of meat for the Grey Company.
'You have upheld your end of our bargain; therefore, we will honour our own. Take this meat to your friends, and let them know that we are grateful to them for granting us your skilled hand.'
Davudh is at Uch Cadlus, south-west of the ox-herds.\n\nYou should return to Davudh with news of your success.
Amlan is at Echad Saeradan, far to the north-west of Uch Cadlus.\n\nDavudh gave you a package of meat to take to the Rangers of the Grey Company.
Davudh is at Uch Cadlus, far to the south-east of Echad Saeradan.\n\nAmlan told you to convey his thanks to Davudh.
'Our herds are ravaged day and night by wolves and Cun Annun, terrible demons of legend!'
'Ah! It is we who should be grateful, [placeholder]... this meat will go far to replenish our supplies.\n\n'Return to Davudh with our thanks.'
'Take the meat to your duvodiad friends.'
'Were you unable to obtain more meat from the Uch-lûth?'
Defeat creatures hunting the ox-herds of the Uch-lûth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Davudh at Uch Cadlus
Bring the ox-meat to Amlan at Echad Saeradan
Talk to Davudh at Uch Cadlus
